body: One day, I wanted to play walls and the server that I used to go on had removed walls. I found wallsmc.com on the minecraft server list and started to play it. Mczone, at this time, was only a walls server and did not have nebula or nexus. I enjoyed it and when nebula, nexus and survival games came out I started to play walls less and less. When avicus replaced mczone, everything was Better apart from the fact that Survival games was removed.

title: How did you find out about avicus?

replies.body: Back when walls was popular, I wanted to find a walls server, I saw walls mc, it sounded official to me so I joined :PPP (January 6, 2013)
replies.body_tagged: Back when walls was popular, I wanted to find a walls server, I saw walls mc, it sounded official to me so I joined :PPP (January 6, 2013)

replies.body: I was looking for unique servers and came across the community of avicus
replies.body_tagged: I was looking for unique servers and came across the community of avicus

replies.body: I was on OCN when I found Avicus ob YLO's pvp montage :p
replies.body_tagged: I was on OCN when I found Avicus ob YLO's pvp montage :p

replies.body: I saw OrphanSoup's tournament videos and decided to check this server out.
replies.body_tagged: I saw OrphanSoup's tournament videos and decided to check this server out.

replies.body: I actually found this server when I was looking for servers and I just typed in random ip addresses, so I typed in wallsmc.com and I was hocked on the Sky Wars and Ghost Squadron.
replies.body_tagged: I actually found this server when I was looking for servers and I just typed in random ip addresses, so I typed in wallsmc.com and I was hocked on the Sky Wars and Ghost Squadron.

replies.body:
For my birthday, I got Minecraft. The same day I got it, after all my other friends left, I played it for the first time. I started out on hardcore, then got bored, and said "here, try out this server." Ip? Play.mczone.co making this my first server. :D

I found the community after someone told me I should join the forums.

I found the community after someone told me I should join the forums.

replies.body: On April 14, 2013. Clock was bored. His friends server got boring. He went to the Minecraft server list and found MC Zone. It had Walls, Sky wars, Ghost squadron, etc. I joined the server and loved it. So I've been in McZone/Avicus for one year and that's how I found out about this awesome server.
replies.body_tagged: On April 14, 2013. Clock was bored. His friends server got boring. He went to the Minecraft server list and found MC Zone. It had Walls, Sky wars, Ghost squadron, etc. I joined the server and loved it. So I've been in McZone/Avicus for one year and that's how I found out about this awesome server.

replies.body: when the ocn vs avicus thing started to esculate.

replies.body: Looking for a server to play SG on with my brother :)
replies.body_tagged: Looking for a server to play SG on with my brother :)

replies.body: Joint back in the early mczone days. I found it listed on a server listing website and thought "This looks cool" I am soooo glad I joint :D Avicus was the first server I spent more than 20 seconds on
replies.body_tagged: Joint back in the early mczone days. I found it listed on a server listing website and thought "This looks cool" I am soooo glad I joint :D Avicus was the first server I spent more than 20 seconds on

replies.body:
when I said "hey pizza! I got operator on a medium-sized server!"
Pizza:"Oh yah? I got Jr.Mod on A BIG server!"
Me: "gasps"
Pizza:"well, ive seen ur server, lets go and see mine tmrw :)"
Me:"k"
and that was exactly how i got introduced...
although I only played for 2 days, then left for two months.. and then i came back.. and didn't know how to join a game, so I spent 3 hours at a spectator spawn... like wth, why am i not joining?
i finally joined when there was a sign that said /join :o

replies.body:
welll. i got minecraft for my B-Day and 2 month later i got minecraft i got banned from it.
and got it deleted from my computer, Several months later i started to play it again. i had no more servers no more worlds. i only ip for a server. i got board of it in minutes.
So i when to a server list and i found you guys. DUN DUN DUUUU

I don't remember HOW i found the server, I probably found it while searching for "walls" server.
I'm so glad I found this server.
Community Rocks
People are nice

I love this server so much <3

replies.body: My friend (Wuffo) showed me MCzone, I played nexus from time to time (Hardly ever), then it got removed so I quit, then it got re-added so I'm now a happy fish.
